contentrichtext.text: :''For the neighborhood of San Francisco, see [[Pacific Heights, San Francisco, California]].'' {{coord|39|27|10|N|121|36|10|W|display=title}} '''Pacific Heights''' is a former settlement in [[Butte County, California|Butte County]], [[California]], [[United States]]. It was located {{convert|3.25|mi|km|1}} west-northwest of [[Palermo, California|Palermo]].<ref name=CGN>{{California's Geographic Names|289}}</ref> Nearby was the mining camp of [[Lava Beds, California|Lava Beds]], inhabited by Chinese miners.<ref name=CGN /> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Butte County, California}} [[Category:Former settlements in Butte County, California]] [[Category:Former populated places in California]] {{ButteCountyCA-geo-stub}}
